product_name: Redpoint: The Self-Coached Climber's Guide to Redpoint and On-Sight Climbing - Book with DVD
long_description: . Authors: Dan Hague and Douglas Hunter. Softcover; 215 pages; color photographs. Stackpole Books; copyright 2011. . Includes handy ways to use equipment and rope when working up routes. Also offers ideas on how to prepare mentally, physically and emotionally. Includes instructional DVD; approximate running time 35 min.
short_description: Redpoint: The Self-Coached Climber's Guide to Redpoint and On-Sight Climbing takes you through the finer points of the techniques associated with redpointing and on-sight climbing.
